mapper.select: /* 방목록 불러오기 */ SELECT RI.ROOM_ID, RI.ROOM_NAME, COUNT(RM.MEMBER_ID) AS MEMBER_COUNT, GROUP_CONCAT( IF(RM.MEMBER_ID != #{userId}, UM.USER_ID, NULL) SEPARATOR ',' ) AS PROFILES FROM ROOM_INFO RI JOIN ROOM_MEMBER RM ON RI.ROOM_ID = RM.ROOM_ID JOIN USER_MASTER UM ON RM.MEMBER_ID = UM.USER_ID WHERE RI.ROOM_ID IN ( SELECT RM2.ROOM_ID FROM ROOM_MEMBER RM2 WHERE RM2.MEMBER_ID = #{userId} ) GROUP BY RI.ROOM_ID, RI.ROOM_NAME ORDER BY RI.ROOM_ID DESC
SELECT UM.USER_ID, UM.USER_NAME, IFNULL(UM.STAT_MSG, '') AS STAT_MSG FROM USER_MASTER UM INNER JOIN ROOM_MEMBER RM ON UM.USER_ID = RM.MEMBER_ID WHERE RM.ROOM_ID = #{roomId}
